text: On-call, or on-call scheduling, is a type of employee work schedule. On Call may also refer to: * "On Call" (song), a 2007 song by Kings of Leon * On Call, a 1974 novel by Elizabeth Harrison (writer) * On Call: Serbisyong Totoo. Ngayon., a Philippine public service TV program * "On Call" (Casualty), a 2015 webisode of the BBC medical drama ==See also== * On-call room, a room in a hospital for staff rest * DART On-Call, a premium shuttle service by Dallas Area Rapid Transit
title: On Call
